snippet.title: Do U Copy? - Cinematic Trailer [VR, iOS-Android]
snippet.description:
Do U Copy? is a fully VR asymmetrical communication-based party game. To achieve your common objective, you’ll need to communicate and progress together through various exciting scenarios!

In the first chapter (The Heist),  you’ll be immersed in a « not-so-typical » bank heist. Choose to play as the Robber (VR) or the Operator (PC/Mobile) and cooperate with your ally to get the prized loot!

‘Only challenge is… you can’t see what the other sees.

Make your way through the bank, solve puzzles, sneak behind guards and avoid hazardous traps in your ultimate way to the vault. 

In this coop die-and-retry, your communication skills will be put to the test… your friendship too...

Stay up-to-date at:
https://twitter.com/FreaksUtdStudio
https://discord.gg/45phnRpjXb
http://www.fugamestudio.com

Follow Freaks United:
https://twitter.com/FreaksUtdStudio
https://www.facebook.com/FreaksUnitedStudio
https://www.instagram.com/freaksunitedstudio
info@fugamestudio.com

Special thanks to :
THE GAME Paris - www.thegame-france.com

Jade Gueniche (@jademacguen)
Noam Cartozo (@noamcartozo)
Elie Attia (@elie_s_attia)
Martine Bekerman
Samuel Jaoui

Directed by Mickaël & Daniel Zaluski (@mickazal)
Edited by Titouan Meysonnier & Mickaël Zaluski
Music by Jules Vidal (@jeuneoji_music)

 
© 2021 Freaks United SASU. All rights reserved. Freaks United, Do U Copy? and their respective logos are registered trademarks or trademarks of Freaks United in the US, EU and/or other territories. All other trademarks are property of their respective owners.
